Allright, three men it is. And I formed up an official sounding rule 
(a variation of the original):

Since there have been no mobile bases in the Beast Wars, and also 
since mobile bases give an unfair tactical advantage (and often lead 
to moding), mobile bases (any mobile craft other than a transport 
pod, one-person transport ship, or something to that extent is 
considered a base and is subject to this rule) are not allowed. 
Allowed vehicles are small (up to three bot) transports, with no 
onboard weapons, shields, or CR chambers. If you arrive on the planet 
in a ship not abiding to these rules, it must be grounded where it 
lands, and may not be moved.


How does that sound? Unless there are a bunch of objections, it'll 
end up on the new site.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> OOC: Because my sub idea was already rolling before this whole 
three bot deal 
> took place, im still going to be using it for my design...but I 
will only 
> place three bots in it.
